titleStmt.title: At [blank] the [blank] day of [blank] 1646 yeers. Forsameikle as the Estates of Parliament, by their Act of the date the third day of Februar 1646 yeers, have granted power and commission, to prosecute the wayes and means already laid down, for bringing in of moneys, for the use and entertainment of the armies and garrisons within this kingdom ...
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Parliament. Committee of Estates.

titleStmt.title: At [blank] the [blank] day of [blank] 1646 yeers. Forsameikle as the Estates of Parliament, by their Act of the date the third day of Februar 1646 yeers, have granted power and commission, to prosecute the wayes and means already laid down, for bringing in of moneys, for the use and entertainment of the armies and garrisons within this kingdom ...
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Parliament. Committee of Estates.

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and first lines of text.
Form of receipt for a loan for the use of the army according to the Act of Parliament dated 3rd February 1646.
Form is filled out in the name of Mr. James Hervie for the sum of 300 marks, and dated 23rd October 1646.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
